title.text: Internet Explorer 8 for Windows XP with Language Interface Pack

description.text: Internet Explorer 8 is the latest version of the familiar Web browser that you are most comfortable using.  Internet Explorer 8 helps you get everything that you want from the Web faster, easier, and more privately and securely than ever. This installation is only for versions of Windows XP that have a Language Interface Pack installed. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer.
